summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 KAWASAKI VULCAN 1600. WHILE INSPECTING THE VEHICLE, THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT FUEL WAS LEAKING FROM THE FUEL TANK. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALERSHIP WHERE THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE FUEL TANK NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE APPROXIMATELY 30,000.     UPDATED 7/26/10 *CN     THE CONSUMER STATED THE MANUFACTURER AGREED TO REPLACE THE TANK AND PADS ON;Y. THE CONSUMER PAID FOR NEW GASKETS AND LABOR. UPDATED 08/31/10*JB
